# NetworkDecoder

**Protocol**

A type that conforms to the NetworkEncoder protocol can decode data to an Encodable object

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NetworkDecoder
```

## Instance Methods

- **decode(_:from:)**: Decode a decodable object from Data
